title: Liverpool Unveil Klopp Hope Poster
text:
16:37 CET Liverpool Unveil Klopp Hope Poster By Daily Guide 
Liverpool have unveiled a unique programme cover, ahead of Thursday night’s Europa League clash against Rubin Kazan - Jurgen Klopp’s first home game in charge. 
The club created a parody of the famous Barack Obama ‘Hope’ poster, which was used when the current US President launched his campaign back in 2008. 
The rest is history for Obama; and Liverpool will be hoping their version of the Klopp ‘Hope’ poster will bring the German manager success in his new challenge. 
Klopp had to settle for a draw in his first game against Tottenham, but will be hopeful of victory against Russian side Rubin Kazan during his first game as manager under the Anfield floodlights. 
Liverpool are yet to win a Europa League game this season, having drawn their two opening Group B fixtures against Bordeaux and Sion. 
The Reds have struggled to click, with both of those draws ending 1-1, but former manager Gerard Houllier claims Klopp will bring the best out of the club.
